document_data.caption: A map showing Endshift Street and surroundings in the Field Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Endshift Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Endshift Street''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Endshift Street was located in the eastern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Field Ward|Field Ward]]. The road branched off of the northeast side of the [[Breezeway]], ending at a dead end at a small unnamed courtyard after several buildings.
